abstract_ssm: This collection includes a document drawn up by John Dikeman pertaining to the estate of Josiah Dikeman and signed by his four sons (dated February 8, 1819), and a receipt of items bought from John Dikeman by William R. Dean (dated April  24, 1819).  John Dikeman, judge and lawyer, helped found and taught in a Sunday School for African-Americans in the village of Brooklyn (circa 1815).
